Verses: 1 appozhudhu Naagamaaththiyanaana Soppaar Pradhiyuththaramaaga:
2 idharkaaga Maru Uththaravukodukka Sindhanaigal Ennai Evugirapadiyaal Naan Theeviriththu Sollugiren.
3 nindhiththen Endru Naan Kadindhukollappattadhaik Ketten; Aanaalum Unarvinaal En Aavi Pradhiyuththaram Solla Ennai Evugiradhu.
4 dhunmaarkkanin Gembeeram Kuruginadhu Enbadhaiyum, Maayakkaaranin Sandhosham Oru Nimishammaaththiram Nirkum Enbadhaiyum,
5 avar Manushanai Boomiyil Vaiththa Aadhikaalamudhal Ippadiyirukkiradhu Enbadhaiyum Neer Ariyeero?
6 avanudaiya Menmai Vaanabariyandham Uyarndhaalum, Avanudaiya Thalai Megangalmattum Ettinaalum,
7 avan Than Malaththaippola Endraikkum Azhindhupovaan; Avanaik Kandavargal, Avan Enge? Enbaargal.
8 avan Oru Soppanaththaippol Parandhupoik Kaanappadaadhavanaavaan; Iravil Thondrum Dharisanaththaippol Parakkadikkappaduvaan.
9 avanaip Paarththa Kan Ini Avanaip Paarppadhillai; Avan Irundha Sthalam Ini Avanaik Kaanbadhillai.
10 avan Pillaigal Elimaiyaanavargalin Sagaayaththaith Theduvaargal; Avan Pariththadhai Avan Kaigal Thirumbak Kodukkavendiyadhaagum.
11 avan Elumbugal Avanudaiya Vaalavayadhin Paavangalinaal Niraindhirundhu, Avanodekooda Mannile Paduththukkollum.
12 pollaappu Avan Vaayile Inimaiyaayiruppadhaal, Avan Adhaith Than Naavinkeezh Adakki,
13 adhai Vidaamal Padhanampanni, Than Vaaikkulle Vaiththukkondirundhaalum,
14 avan Pojanam Avan Kudalgalil Maari, Avanukkul Viriyanpaambugalin Pichchaaippogum.
15 avan Vizhungina Aasthiyaik Kakkuvaan; Dhevan Adhai Avan Vayitrilirundhu Veliye Thallividuvaar.
16 avan Viriyanpaambugalin Vishaththai Urinjuvaan; Viriyanin Naakku Avanaik Kollum.
17 thenum Neyyum Odum Vaaikkaalgalaiyum Aarugalaiyum Avan Kaanbadhillai.
18 thaan Prayaasappattuth Thedinadhai Avan Vizhungaamal Thirumbakkoduppaan; Avan Thirumbakkodukkiradhu Avan Aasthikku Sariyaayirukkum; Avan Kalikooraadhiruppaan.
19 avan Odukki, Ezhaigalaik Kaivittu, Thaan Kattaadha Veettaip Pariththapadiyinaalum,
20 than Vayiru Thirupthiyatrirundhapadiyinaalum, Avan Ichchiththa Kaariyangalil Avanukku Ondrum Iruppadhillai.
21 avan Pojanaththil Ondrum Meedhiyaavadhillai; Aagaiyaal Avan Aasthi Nilainirpadhillai.
22 avan Vendumengira Paripooranam Avanukku Vandhapin, Avanukku Viyaagulam Undaagum; Sirumaippadugira Ovvoruvarudaiya Kaiyum Avanmel Varum.
23 than Vayitrai Nirappaththakkadhu Innum Avanukku Irundhaalum, Avar Avanmel Thamadhu Kobaththin Ukkiraththai Varavittu, Avan Pojanampannugaiyil, Adhai Avanmel Soriyappannuvaar.
24 iruppu Aayudhaththukku Avan Thappiyodinaalum Urukkuvil Avanai Uruva Eyyum.
25 uruvina Pattayam Avan Sareeraththaiyum, Minnugira Ambu Avan Pichchaiyum Uruvippogum; Bayangarangal Avanmel Varum.
26 avan Olikkum Idangalil Kaarirul Adangiyirukkum; Aviyaadha Akkini Avanaip Patchikkum; Avan Koodaaraththil Meedhiyaayirukkiravan Theengu Anubavippaan.
27 vaanangal Avan Akkiramaththai Velippaduththi, Boomi Avanukku Virodhamaaga Ezhumbum.
28 avan Veettin Sambaththup Poividum; Avarudaiya Kobaththin Naalile Avaigal Karaindhupogum.
29 idhuve Dhevanaal Dhunmaarkkanukkuk Kidaikkum Pangum, Avan Seygaikku Dhevanaal Avanukkuvarum Sudhandharamumaam Endraan.
